snippet: The company announced that it would start building a fifth model, the ML Coupe, at its Alabama plant next year.
abstract: Mercedes announces it will start production on fifth model, ML Coupe, at its Alabama plant in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The company announced that it would start building a fifth model, the ML Coupe, at its Alabama plant next year.

headline.main: Mercedes Expands Work at Alabama Plant
headline.print_headline: Mercedes Expands Work at Alabama Plant
